website_summaries.verdict: This slim, stylish, and unique design is perfect for day-to-day functionality and features a front storage pocket with a diagonal, waterproof zipper.
pros: We love how sleek this bag is
It's perfect for a hike or a trip to the farmer's market
More spacious than you would expect
cons: Some have said the front pocket isn't as big as they would like

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack, but the zipper could be better
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking backpack, made from durable material. The red and white striped inside is fun too, but the main zipper isn't as easy as it could be to use. It's a little sticky, and the flap covering the zipper adds to the bag's overall design appeal but takes away from the zipper's accessibility and function.
customer_reviews.author: Katie H.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Herschel makes great quality backpacks. I own two right now. First, I like the different variety of colors you choose from. Second, the quality of the bag itself is nice. I've had it in the rain already and it survived a soaking with none of my items in my bag getting wet. It's a standard backpack with just a front zip pocket, but inside is big enough hold my 13' laptop, a pen bag, a couple notebooks and my day planner.
customer_reviews.author: Jerold Chinn

customer_reviews.title: In love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it. I use it every day. Very sleek and stylish - and most importantly, comfortable. I love the 2 pockets on each side: perfect for my umbrella and water bottle. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. I needed something that was comfortable and fit my 15 inch laptop, and it fit the bill. Super well made, the angled zipper on the front is a fun touch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Berger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag! Perfect for day-to-day or for travel - tons and tons of compliments. It is surprisingly roomy and very functional. Love the laptop section and the roomy pockets!
customer_reviews.author: DeeBee

customer_reviews.title: I love it a lot got it a few weeks before ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it a lot got it a few weeks before college starts. Can’t wait to use it for college. Will go great with my surface pro inside though you can’t see it it’s light weight and that’s what I want and I want a bag that’s look nice and minimalistic. I don’t wanna bag that how many pockets and that’s big. Love this bag!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Luke Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag....great price point, great quality. Good size as my work bag. I am a minimalist so, it can fit much more than i need it to.
customer_reviews.author: Dung T Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking easy to put laptop in and out feels very secure great quality
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bag, love the color, fron pocket is too small. Overall im satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: M.S.V.

customer_reviews.title: The best backpack Ive owned
customer_reviews.text: The perfect bag... A. its name is the same as my last name and it fits my 2 note books a DSLR, 3 lenses, a tech survival kit, 2 laptops and their chargers, I never leave without it, and on top of all of that it looks great
customer_reviews.author: William p

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as a regular backpack. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is sturdy and a great color
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is sturdy and a great color! The laptop sleeve part is a bit hard to actually insert the laptop but it does fit
customer_reviews.author: W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the wife, cause she has the last version and she loves em
customer_reviews.author: Fabian c.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is everything I want in a backpack. Durable, lots of compartments, comfortable. It still looks brand new after many months of carrying it just about every day.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: actually pretty good (I got to keep it pg Comes in ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was sketchy but I got the bag and it seems real (no bs). actually pretty good (I got to keep it pg Comes in a plastic bag that seems real
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The downside is that the back part is not cushioned, but besides that I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eduarda Castro

customer_reviews.title: Received in good condition. Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Received in good condition. Item as described. Bought this at promotion price. Quite sturdy backpack although it looks a bit small. Overall I'm satisfied with my purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny P.

product_meta.title: Herschel Parker (Update)
product_meta.description: The slim, stylish and everyday Parker backpack features a front storage pocket with a diagonal waterproof zipper.
